rules.name: visualstudio-dc
rules.description: This endpoint is used for metrics and monitoring telemetry using Azure Monitor.

rules.name: ods-opinsights
rules.description: This endpoint is used by Azure Monitor for ingesting log analytics data.

rules.name: oms-opinsights
rules.description: This endpoint is used by OMS agent, which is used to authenticate with the Log Analytics service.

rules.name: monitoring-azure
rules.description: This endpoint is used to send metrics data to Azure Monitor.
